QueryResult.text: SELECT t.object_name, t.object_type, c.column_name, CASE WHEN c.data_type = 'DATE' OR c.data_type = 'CLOB' OR c.data_type ='ROWID' THEN c.data_type WHEN c.data_type = 'VARCHAR2' OR c.data_type = 'CHAR' THEN c.data_type || '(' || c.data_length || ')' WHEN c.data_type = 'NUMBER' AND c.data_precision IS NULL AND c.data_scale IS NULL THEN c.data_type WHEN c.data_type = 'NUMBER' THEN c.data_type || '(' || c.data_precision || ',' || c.data_scale || ')' ELSE c.data_type END column_length, CASE WHEN c.nullable = 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END allow_nulls, t.object_comments table_comments, cc.comments column_comments FROM dwh_cfg_schema_objects_v t INNER JOIN user_tab_columns c ON t.object_name = c.table_name LEFT OUTER JOIN user_col_comments cc ON c.table_name = cc.table_name AND c.column_name = cc.column_name
